content: a beautiful tribute blanket to memorialize the loss of a cherished member of your fur family or as a gift to an animal lover work it up in any color imaginable or every color imaginable if you would like to work through your yarn stash i cannot wait to see all of the colors combinations and blankets that are made this pattern was a collaboration between myself and doug speeckaert i am so thankful for him and the work he put into expanding the meandering paw prints scarf pattern feel free to make for profit but remember to give credit to us and link back to my blog www amysastitchatatime blogspot com thank you amy b and doug size can be made any size you wish the pattern is very easily adjusted width wise it is worked in multiples of 20 + 2 so make your foundation chain as wide or narrow as you like materials worked with size 4/medium/worsted weight yarn and an h hook
